purpose: The email invites submissions to three workshops co-located with PROFES 2025 in Salerno, Italy, in December 2025.
evidence_sentences: We are pleased to invite submissions to the following three workshops,
to be held in Salerno, Italy, on December 1, 2025:

These workshops provide forums for researchers, practitioners, and policymakers to present and discuss recent advancements and challenges in software engineering and its intersection with machine learning, healthcare technologies, and software analytics.
